description: Try our easy to follow Easy Traditional Christmas Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Traditional Christmas Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the royal icing, lightly whisk egg whites and lemon juice together in a bowl. Gradually add icing sugar, whisking until smooth and combined. Spread icing over cake, then stand for 1 hour or until set, Decorate with rosemary and serve
